dmca.title: Google Group DMCA complaint - John Wiley & Sons
dmca.body:
WILEY
Publishers Since 1807
JOHN WILEY & SONS, INC.
Legal Department
111 River Street, Hoboken, NJ 07030
Telephone Number: 201-748-6014	Facsimile Number: 201-748-6500

To:	Google Legal Support - DMCA Complaints

Fax:	650-963-3255

From:	Patrick Murphy

Date:	September 20, 2006

	RE:	DMCA Nonce

Pages including
	this cover page:	3

This fax is intended only for the designated recipient(s). It may contain confidential or proprietary information and may be subject to the attorney-client privilege or other confidentiality protections. If you are not a designated recipient, you may not review, copy or distribute this fax. If you receive this in error, please notify the sender and properly dispose of this fax. Thank you.






John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
Publishers Since 1807
September 20, 2006

Google, Inc.
Atm: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
VIA FAX ONLY: 650-963-3255

To Whom It May Concern:

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named John Wiley & Sons, Inc., a global publisher of books, journals, and other products, or one of its related companies ("Wiley").

We recently learned that unauthorized copies of the material listed below are being made available for sale by msfendi@gmail.com on a website hosted by your company at the following URL addresses:

http://groups_google.com/group/misc.invest.stocks/browse_thread/thread/6b16257b12831614/f263a07ef00c2f36?hl-en#f263a07ef00e2f36

http://groups.google.com/group/alt.invest.penny-stocks/browse_thread/thread/d58d9879a81e501f750f9b30b64b2c4db?hl=en#50f9b30b64b2c4db

http://groups.google.com/group/alt.invest.stocks.amd/browse_thread/thread/436633all267faee/52ee6ef6b9edc803?hl=en#52ee6ef6b9edcS03

http://groups.google.com/group/alt.invest.technical-analysis/browse_thread/thread/6be1d9f1373390a3/3fa76468f351h557?hl=en#3fa76468f351b557

Please note that this is the second request Wiley has made to Google to remove unauthorized ebooks being offered for sale by msfendi@gmail.com using both Google Groups and a Gmail account. Google previously assigned a case number of 64941780 to Wiley's original request of July 14, 2006.

While the decision is solely Google's, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. respectfully suggests that this seller be permanently suspended from Google Groups, in light of their willful and repeated infringement of our intellectual property.

We reserve the right to claim any damages accruing to Wiley as a result of Google's failure to suspend this individual, despite Wiley's repeated notifications to Google of the individual's infringement of its intellectual property.

The material is as follows:

1. Trading for a Living, (ISBN 0-471-59224-2) by Alexander Elder
2. Trading to Win, (ISBN 0-471-24842-8) by Ari Kiev
3. Trading Chaos, (ISBN 0-47146308-6) by Justine Williams
4. Sniper Trading, (ISBN 0471-39422-X) by George Angell
5. New Market Wizards, (ISBN 0-471-13236-5) by Jack Schwager
6. Reminiscences of a Stock Operator, (ISBN 0-471-05968-4) by Edwin LeFevre
7. Rocket Science for Traders, (ISBN 0-471-40567-1) by John Ehlers
8. Intermarket Technical Analysis, (ISBN 0-471-52433-6) by John Murphy
9. How I Trade Options, (ISBN 0471-31278-9) by Jon Najarian
10. Long-Term Secrets to Short-Term Trading, (ISBN 0-471-29722-4) by Larry Williams
11. Dynamic Tradinglndicators, (ISBN 0-471-21557-0) by David Stendahl
12. 1Hedge Fund Edge, (ISBN 0-471-18538-8) by Mark Boucher
13. Logical Trader, (ISBN 0-471-21551-1) by Mark Fisher
14. Investment Psychology Explained, (ISBN 0-471-13300-0) by Martin Pring
15. Investment Psychology, (ISBN 0471-55721-8) by Pring Research
16. Cybernetic Trading, (ISBN 0-471-14920-9) by Murray Ruggiero
17. Dynamic Hedging, (ISBN 0-471-15280-3) by Nassim Taleb
18. Trading Systems and Methods, (ISBN 0-471-14879-2) by Perry Kaufman
19. Steidlmayer on Markets, (ISBN 0-471-62115-3) by Peter Steidlmayer
20. Mathematics of Money Management, (ISBN 0-471-54738-7) by Ralph Vince
21. Strategic Electronic Day Trader, (ISBN 0-171-25488-6) by Robert Dee!
22. Fibonacci Applications and Strategies for Traders, (ISBN 0471-58520-3) by Robert Fischer
23. Trading Game, (ISBN 0-471-31698-9) by Ryan Jones
24. Encyclopedia of Chart Patterns, (ISBN 0-471-66826-5) by Thomas Bulkowski
25. Beyond Technical Analysis, (ISBN 0-471-41567-7) by Tushar Chande
26. Day Trader's Manual, (ISBN 0-471-51406-3) by William Ng

I have a good faith belief that the use of the titles identified above are not authorized by Wiley, its agent, or the law and therefore constitute a serious infringement of, inter alia, Wiley's copyrights.

We understand that many responsible ISPs inadvertently infringe the copyrights of others, and that this may be one such case. Accordingly, we will forbear legal action against your company provided that you comply with the following:

1. You remove or block access to the infringing matter within 48 hours of the time and date of this e-mail; and

2. You provide reasonably requested assistance in helping Wiley to find and prosecute the responsible party/parties. This includes sending me any information you have on file regarding the owner of the offending web site.


Thank you in advance for your cooperation

Sincerely, 
[signed]

Patrick Murphy
Paralegal
John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
111
